description: Associates an access policy and its scope to an access entry. For more information about associating access policies, see Associating and disassociating access policies to and from access entries in the Amazon EKS User Guide.

parameters.name: principalArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM user or role for the AccessEntry that you're associating the access policy to.

parameters.name: policyArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the AccessPolicy that you're associating. For a list of ARNs, use ListAccessPolicies.

parameters.name: accessScope
parameters.description: The scope for the AccessPolicy. You can scope access policies to an entire cluster or to specific Kubernetes namespaces. type (string) --- The scope type of an access policy. namespaces (list) --- A Kubernetes namespace that an access policy is scoped to. A value is required if you specified namespace for Type. (string) ---

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: The scope type of an access policy.

nested_params.name: namespaces
nested_params.description: A Kubernetes namespace that an access policy is scoped to. A value is required if you specified namespace for Type.

nested_items.name: principalArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM principal for the AccessEntry.

nested_items.name: associatedAccessPolicy
nested_items.description: The AccessPolicy and scope associated to the AccessEntry.

nested_items.name: accessScope
nested_items.description: The scope of the access policy.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The scope type of an access policy.

nested_items.name: namespaces
nested_items.description: A Kubernetes namespace that an access policy is scoped to. A value is required if you specified namespace for Type.

nested_items.name: associatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the AccessPolicy was associated with an AccessEntry.

nested_items.name: modifiedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix epoch timestamp for the last modification to the object.
